oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RPPC Sevierville 3
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Caption on back: ‘Jeb and John at the fair in Severville in 1912.’ Two young boys, one in hat, the other wearing overalls and holding a hoe. 1 p RPPC (Real photo postcard).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Children; Fairs; Postcards;
